title: Instagram Video Downloader Input
description: Download Instagram videos and extract metadata. Supports single videos, reels, and batch downloads. Can download full videos or extract metadata only.

urls.title: Instagram URLs
urls.description:
Instagram URL(s) to process. You can provide:
- A single URL
- Multiple URLs one per line
- Comma-separated URLs
- JSON array format: ["url1", "url2"]

Examples:
Single: https://instagram.com/user/p/VIDEO_ID
Multiple lines:
https://instagram.com/user1/p/123
https://instagram.com/user2/reel/456
JSON: ["https://instagram.com/...", "https://instagram.com/..."]

downloadMode.title: Download Mode
downloadMode.description: Choose whether to download full videos or extract metadata only.

maxItems.title: Maximum Items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of videos to process from playlists or channels. Set to 0 for unlimited (not recommended for large playlists).

quality.title: Video Quality
quality.description: Preferred video quality/format. Only applies when downloading videos. The actor automatically falls back to lower or best available qualities if the requested one is missing.

cookies.title: Instagram Cookies (optional)
cookies.description: Optional cookies to bypass Instagram authentication. Accepts both JSON format (from browser dev tools) and Netscape format. JSON cookies will be automatically converted. Leave empty if videos are publicly accessible.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for downloading Instagram videos. Recommended to use Apify Proxy to avoid potential rate limiting or IP blocking.
